par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po'i sems bcings pa med na rnam par grol ba gang yin/ smras pa/ gang bcings pa med par yongs su shes pa de rnam par grol ba'o/ /smras pa/

btsun pa 'od srung chen po'i sems gang gis sems gang yongs su shes/ 'das pas sam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pas sam/ 'on te da ltar byung bas sam/ gang 'das pa de ni zad pa/ gang ma 'ongs pa de ni ma phyin pa/ gang da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa

med pa yin na sems gang gis sems gang yongs su shes/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni 'gog pa ste/ de la sems kyi bgrang ba gang yang med do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung sems 'gog pa yongs su shes sam/ smras

pa/ sems 'gog pa ni yongs su shes par mi nus so/ /smras pa/ sems de thams cad 'gog par ltung ba ste/ de'i phyir cung zad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ba med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod spobs par gyis shig /kho bo la ni khyod la

lan gdab pa'i nus pa med do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di la ji snyam du sems/ brag ca la spobs pa yod dam/ smras pa/ med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brag ca ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ btsun pa

'od srung chen po chos thams cad kyang brag ca lta bu ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di la ji snyam du sems/ brag ca'i spobs pa bcad nus sam/ smras pa/ mi brjod pas

de bcad do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin te/ kun mi 'dri bas byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa chad do/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po gal te bskal par yongs su 'dri na yang kho bo yang bskal par spobs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar des bstan pas 'khor 'di dag gi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid 'di mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa la bskul du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal

gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'di ci'i phyir sems zhing dman pa dman pa lta bus ston/ 'di ci'i phyir gnas brtan zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ni nyan thos te 'jigs pa med pa ma yin no/ /shes rab brtsegs kyis smras pa/ ci 'di

theg pa chen po la ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya ba 'di ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa

de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa gsum las brtsams te chos ston to/ /gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa gsum po de dag go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni dman pa la mos

pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid tshad med/ mtshan ma med pa tshad med/ smon pa med pa tshad med na ci'i phyir nyi tshe ba'i 'du shes su mdzad/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ gang gi phyir stong pa nyid

tshad med/ mtshan ma med pa tshad med/ smon pa med pa tshad med kyang nyi tshe ba'i 'du shes kyis mos par mdzad do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag phyir zhing dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal gyis

smras pa/ rigs kyi bu re zhig sdod la klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i spobs pa ji tsam pa dang / chos nyid tshad med pa yang nyon cig/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog de ci 'dra ba'i chos ston/ smras pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtam ste/ ro gcig pa dang / tshad med pa'i chos las byung ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs

rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la mos pa ma yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yang dag par 'du ba'o/ /'jigs pa med pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams ni der mi skye ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i chos bstan pa ni de 'dra'o/ /

de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gang la blta bar 'dod de 'dir 'ongs/ ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /

smras pa/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci gzugs kyi mi rtag pa de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /

smras pa/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mi rtag pa de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci gzugs kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong

pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang /

bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/

rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci sha'i mig gis de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci lha'i mig gis de bzhin gshegs par

blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci shes rab kyi mig gis de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ klu'i

bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar de la blta'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra/ smras pa/ klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ rab tu 'dra ba med pa'o/ /mi mnyam pa

zhes bya ba ni/ de la gnyen po med pa'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni de la gnyen po mnyam pa yang med pa'o/ /mtshungs pa med ces bya ba ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab tu 'dra ba med ces bya ba ni rtags med cing mtshan ma med pa'i

phyir ro/ /klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa ni de 'dra ste de ltar blta bar bya'i/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha'i mig ni snang ba mthong ba yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mun pa dang snang ba

ma yin pas sha'i mig gis de blta bar mi nus so/ /lha'i mig ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mngon par 'dus ma byas pas lha'i mig gis de blta bar mi nus so/ /shes rab kyi mig gis ni 'byung ba yongs su shes

pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mi 'byung bas shes rab kyi mig gis de blta bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ klu'i bdag po

gang gi tshe mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / sems kyang mi skye la gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa yang mi 'gog pa de tsam gyis na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa yin

no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang dag gis klu'i rgyal pos zhus pa 'di thos pa dang /

thos nas mos pa dang / mi dngang mi skrag la 'dzin pa dang / ston pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/ /bdag cag kyang 'dir lhags shing tshul 'di thos pas bdag cag don med par ma gyur to/ /gang na

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar

rig par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcad do/ /mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad pham par byas so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal mi

spyod pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin no zhes bya na/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ klu'i bdag po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi spyod

pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid ser sna can rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid de/ spyod pa mnyam pa de ni mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan yang de bzhin no/ /shes rab dang ldan pa

rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid de/ spyod pa mnyam pa de ni mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid 'dod

chags dang bral ba rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid de/ spyod pa mnyam pa de ni mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin

pa de nyid nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid de/ spyod pa mnyam pa de ni mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gang dag

gsungs pa spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gi spyod pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i spyod pa'i stong pa nyid de/ spyod pa mnyam pa de ni mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyad

pa spyod pa na spyod pa de la mi spyod pas spyod de/ spyad pa spyod pa na spyod pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mngon par zhen pa med pa la mi rtog cing rlom sems su mi byed de/ de'i phyir mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i

phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi spyod pa la spyod pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ klu'i bdag po gang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du dge ba'i spyod pa dang / mi skye ba'i spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i spyod pa dang /

gzung ba med pa'i spyod pa dang / kun gzhi med pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i spyod pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i spyod pa dang / rgyu ba med pa'i spyod pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod

pa dang / cho ga'i spyod pa dang / spyod pa de lta bu la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi spyod pa'i spyod pa la spyod pa'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i spyad pa la spyod par gyur pa na mtshan nyid med pa'i rjes su song zhing rgyu ba med la shes rab la mos pas rnam

par grol te/ rnam par grol nas kyang gnyis su med pa'i mtha' las kyang mi 'da' la yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' de mngon du byed pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ji lta bu/ smras pa/ gzugs mi skye bar bzod pa rab tu thob pa ni mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin

du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bzod pa rab tu thob pa ni mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du mi skye bar bzod pa rab tu thob pa ni mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag

po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob pa des bzod pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de ni kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /de rab tu thob pas sems can thams cad bzod pa rab tu thob pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /kun tu 'gro ba yang mi

skye ba nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid du med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /sems can thams cad ma skyes pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /sems can thams cad de'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par

rjes su mthong ngo / /mnyam pa nyid las gzhan chos phra rab kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bzod pa de yang skad cig pa'o/ /cis skad cig pa zhe na/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi

rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis so/ /ji ltar mig la sogs pa skad cig pa de bzhin du sngon gyi mtha'i bzod pa yang skad cig pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i bzod pa yang skad cig pa'o/ /ji ltar dus gsum gyis bzod pa skad cig pa de bzhin du sems can

thams cad kyang skad cig pa'o/ /cis skad cig pa zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis skad cig pa'o/ /ji ltar sems can thams cad skad cig pa de ltar phyin ci log gis nyon mongs pa skye ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad

cig pa'o/ /de ltar ye shes dang ldan pa mi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can thams cad rnam par grol la nye bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/

bdag gi nyon mongs pa ji ltar skad cig pa dang / ji ltar gsog yin pa ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yang de ltar skad cig pa'o/ /de ltar gsog go/ /rnam par grol ba la ni nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba med do/ /stobs med do/ /gal

te de dag shin tu rnam par grol ba ma yin na ni su yang mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir de dag shin tu rnam par grol ba de'i phyir de dag rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid du gnas so/ /de ltar ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems

can yongs su smin par byed pa la skyo ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad bcings pa med pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu

kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin la/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba ma yin na sgro btags pa'i nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs so/ /sems can 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin la rang bzhin gyis rnam

par grol ba yin na yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs so/ /sems can 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin la rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba yin na/ 'du shes dang / sems dang / yid la byed pas

kun nas nyon mongs so/ /klu'i bdag po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mthob/ so so'i skye bo dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang mi gnas/ yul thams cad kyang

spong / yul la 'dod chags kyis chags pa'ang med/ yul la zhe sdang gis sdang ba yang med/ yul la gti mug gis rmongs pa yang med do/ /yul la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa yang ma yin la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' la yang gnas shing sems

can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rang gi yul la nyon mongs pa med par longs spyod pa'i phyir yul thams cad kyang mi spong ngo / /de bdud kyi yul la yang rgyu zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dor ro/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yul yang rnam

par 'khrug par mi byed la sems can gyi khams kyi yul la yang gnas so/ /chos thams cad yul med cing yul dang bral bar yang rab tu shes shing las kyi yul la yang 'jug go/ /shes rab kyis las med cing las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog la mngon

par 'du byed pa'i yul la yang mngon par 'du byed do/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i yul la yang mi 'jug la btang snyoms pa yang ma yin no/ /dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes par yang yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ 'phags pa'i skyon

med pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin no/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i skyon med pa la mi 'jug ces de skad smra na/ byang chub sems

dpa' skyon med pa la 'jug pa gang yin/ smras pa/ klu'i bdag po phyir mi ldog pa la 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po yid la byed pa thams cad la nga'i ba med par byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes kyang ngar 'dzin

pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa gang las rnam par grol te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pas bcings pa'i

sems can rnams la snying rje skyed pa gang yin/ smras pa/ phung po lngar sgro btags pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa rab tu shes shing phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis rlom sems su yang mi byed la/ phung

po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsams bzhin du srid pa'ang len te/ de skye la 'du byed thams cad mi skye bar yang yang dag par rjes su mthong / skye ba dang / mi skye ba'i phyir skye ba dang / mi skye ba thams cad kyang yang

dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /klu'i bdag po shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas srid par 'gro ba rnams su kun tu snang ngo / /klu'i bdag po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa

ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas lta bar lhung ba'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed do/ /mtshan ma med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po

skyed do/ /smon pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas smon lam la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed do/ /klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa'i chos la

yang 'jug la sems can thams cad kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la yang 'jug la byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la yang 'jug la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis

dge ba'i rtsa ba yang sogs pa dang / shin tu zhi zhing nye bar yang zhi la ma rig pa shin tu ma zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba yang ma zhi ba dang / bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms la sngon gyi dam bcas pa yang mi 'dor ba dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes

pa dang yang bral la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la yang mnyam par gzhag pa dang / nga rgyal thams cad kyang yang dag par 'joms la sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rtogs pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'phags pa'i yon tan yang brjod la 'phags pa ma

yin pa'i chos la gnas par yang brtson pa dang / spros pa yang med la spros pa la yang 'jug pa dang / nye bar yang zhi la nye bar ma zhi ba yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mi g.yo zhing rnam par mi g.yo ba yang rgyun mi gcod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par

bsgrub par yang nye bar gnas pa ni klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten las ldog pa yang ma yin pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po de ltar gang shes rab dang / thabs dang ldan pa dang 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di

ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi skyon med pa la 'jug pa ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos te rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa

ni log par mi ltung ba'i chos te phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po nyan thos kyi skyon med pa la 'jug pa ni mi 'da' ba ste/ gdon mi za bar 'bras bu thob par byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa ni 'da' ba ste/ nyan thos kyi

'bras bu thob par mi byed kyi byang chub kyi snying po'i 'bras bu dang nye bar byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir nyan thos kyi skyon med pa ni tshad du bya ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ni tshad du bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gnyis shig g.yang sa chen

por ltung ba las de la skyes bu gcig ni 'di 'dra ba'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba dang / thabs dang / sngon gyi sbyor ba dang / rigs pa dang ldan par gyur pa zhig pas ltung yang brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis g.yang sa chen po de nas drangs

nas slar g.yang sa chen po de'i khar phyin te gnas so/ /cig shos ni stobs bskyed pa chung la thabs la mi mkhas pas ltung ba de bzhin du/ klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par rnam par lta zhing nye bar rtog la sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen pos yang dag par btang ba'i thabs la mkhas pas yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la gnas so/ /nyan

thos kyi theg pa can ni chos la so sor brtags nas 'bras bu mngon du byed do/ /klu'i bdag po g.yang sa chen po zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi tshig so/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig

so/ /g.yang du lhung nas slar bzlog ma nus pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi tshig so/ /klu'i bdag po gang dag skyon med pa 'di thos pa de dag ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i

skyon med pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring du gnas par

bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang / byang chub kyi

rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon par yang dag par khong du chud par bgyis te rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di mi nyan pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /

de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba'i lam thams cad du nges par 'byung ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba de la sems kyi rang bzhin de gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /smras

pa/ rab 'byor gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ smras pa/ gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin no/ /smras pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin no/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la ji snyam du sems/ rtog pa med na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye bar 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ gang mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de rang bzhin

te/ 'di ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba de gang yin zhes smras pa la 'od gsal ba de ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /gang sems kyi 'od gsal ba de la 'dod chags

dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug med do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa gang dag skye ba de dag skye ba na gang las skye/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor phyin ci log las nyon mongs pa rnams skye mod kyi /sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang kun nas nyon mongs

pa ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gal te sems kyi rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa can yin du zin na ni gang yang shin tu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa de'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs

su shes pas rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rkyen yod par gyur na skye'i rkyen med na mi skye bar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni nyon

mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson pa yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba thams cad dang mi ldan par gnas pa de'i tshe tshul bzhin la

brtson pa yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par grol ba'i chos ston kyang rnam par grol ba der mi ltung ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o/ /

btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi nyon mongs pa dben pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dben par khong du chud pa de yang de'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems

dpa' sbyor ba la sbyor ba ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba ma yin pa la sbyor bar mthong ba de yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs

kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba la sbyor ba ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba ma yin pa la sbyor bar mthong ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gang mig dang / gzugs nas yid dang chos kyi bar de dag ni sbyor ba

ma yin par blta'o/ /sbyor ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni khams gsum du nying mtshams mi sbyor ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar rab tu brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul

bzhin la rab tu brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba 'di de ltar bstan pa ni legs so legs

so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la tshul bzhin de lta bu la rab tu brtson pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges pa yin par blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas chos

thams cad bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med par shes nas gzugs su ma yin/ mtshan du ma yin/ chos su ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de lta bu ni zang zing med pa'i sems

kyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes

su song bar mthong ba de lta bu ni zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /gang chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas par rab tu bsgom pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dus ma byas pa ston pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma

byas gnyis su med pa 'di lta bu ni zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pas rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po

ma dros pa chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te/ dngos po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas rang gi gnas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la

phul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag smon lam 'debs pa ni 'di lags te/ gang bdag gi gnas 'di nas klung chen po bzhi 'bab pa rgya mtsho chen po bzhir 'bab pa'i rgya mtsho chen po de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das klung chen po 'di dag

la 'tshal ba'i sems can rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang dang / dang / bya gang lags pa de dag rgyu des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur cig /gang dag byang chub tu smon pa de dag kyang rgyu des rnam par grol

bar gyur cig /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma'i 'od zer byung nas mtha'

yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyis khyab par byas te/ slar log nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /

mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs mnga' mthong na dga'/ /skyes mchog bcom ldan skyes bu khyu mchog pa/ /'jig rten 'das la 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ /'od gzi bzhad pa'i don 'di bdag la gsungs/ /bsod nams brgya mnga' bsod nams lhag pa

po/ /ye shes kyis 'phags ye shes snang mdzad pa/ /chos dbang mi mtshungs chos kyi bka' mchid can/ /bcom ldan ci yi don du bzhad pa ston/ /bden pa gzigs shing rtag tu bden la dgyes/ /dbang po zhi ba zhi gnas pha rol phyin/ /zhi la rab zhi

zhi gnas dgyes pa po/ /bzhad don yon tan mthar phyin bdag la gsungs/ /'jam pa'i gsung can tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'byin pa/ /bya mchog mang po'i sgra dang sil snyan sgra/ /sgra dbyangs yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbyangs/ /thub pa bzhad

par sbyor ba bdag la gsungs/ /thub pa shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab grol/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag 'khrul pa'i thugs mi mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa sems can spyod la mkhas/ /mtshungs med bzhad pa'i don ni legs par gsungs/ /

ye shes mi phyed dbang gi mthar phyin pa/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa yi stobs ston cing / /stobs bcu mnga' ba dbang gi pha rol gshegs/ /bde bar gshegs khyod ci slad 'dir 'dzum ston/ /sku 'od dpal gyis snang ba mdzad pa po/ /khyod kyi

'od kyis gzhan 'od gsal mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar rgyal ba'i 'od ni mnga' ba ltar/ /nyi zla zhugs dang nor bu'i ma lags so/ /bsod nams chen po the tsom mi mnga' ba/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gsal mdzad/ /bcom ldan

ci slad bzhad pa ston pa de/ /mi mtshungs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung ston/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa de bzhin gshegs

pa la 'di 'dra ba'i bkod pa 'di dag gis mchod pa byed pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'dis byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu

rtsa dgu'i gan du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa

de'i tshe de'i dus na klu'i rgyal po 'di tshong dpon gyi bu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ des nga lung bstan pa thos nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar khye'u blo gros bzang po 'di lung bstan pa bzhin du lung ston par gyur cig

ces smras so/ /kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di ji ltar da ltar nga la 'bul ba de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang rang gi gnas brgyan nas 'bul bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang

de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung yang bzhugs nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi

sgo'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /klu'i bdag po ma dros pa 'di bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyang nyan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/

tshangs par spyad pa yang spyod par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa bdun stong lnga brgya na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dros pa zhes bya ba

nyid du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa byang chub thob pa'i tshe sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba'am/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba'am/ gti mug gi gdung ba'am/ pha rol gyi gdung bas gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ sems

can de dag thams cad kyang nges par tshe'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag brgyad cur 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bai DUr+ya las grub par 'gyur te/ sa

chen po de ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad mas khebs par 'gyur/ lha dang mi de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba yang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor bar 'gyur/ mi de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa

lngas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra bar mi de dag gi yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba ma yin gyi/ de dag thams cad chos kyi dga' ba la

dga' zhing mos par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar da ltar nga rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thams cad kyis chos ston pa ltar de sha thang bar chos ston par mi

'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag kyang chos brjod pa tsam gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha dang mi rnams la chos kyi gtam gcig ston par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan zhes so sor bgrang du

med par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de'i rang gi lus las 'od bkye bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gsal bas khyab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa chos

kyi bka' mchid mdzad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems par 'gyur zhing de dag 'od des bskul ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' las 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dag 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa de shing ta la bdun srid du/ steng gi bar snang la

'phags te/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas/ sems can de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de der 'dug pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du snang bar 'gyur te/ dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /de na

dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i sems can de dag 'di snyam du ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i seng ge'i khri gnas med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang gnas med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid do snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de dag de nyid kyis mngon par rtogs par

'gyur/ bzod pa yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdo rje'i sgo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rdo rje ni gang dang gang du bab pa de dang de dag 'joms so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs

pa de'i chos bstan pa yang bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad 'joms so/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya ba 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin

gshegs pa kun du snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'di 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i bu rtag tu dad

pa thob ces bya ba des nor bu rin po che'i gdugs rin po ches spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes

bgyi bar 'gyur ba de gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par

'phags zhes bya bar 'gyur ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i tshe dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya bar 'gyur

te/ bcom ldan 'das ma dros pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan cing rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs

'di mthar phyin pa'i dus shes nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am

ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas mngon par dga' ste stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod de/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas

klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te klu'i rgyal po lha srung du mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das der bzhugs su gsol nas/

byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bkod de rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du song ste/ des bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bya rgod phung po'i ri la

bskyal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /gsol pa/ bdag gis gzung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

kun dga' bo de'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dag la rgyun mi 'chad par ston cig /de ltar na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la

gshegs so zhes rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis thos nas de dag thams cad dad pa thob ste/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de dag de ltar phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs

'di nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos bstan nas 'khor de las srog chags khris byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /srog chags lnga stong ni chos la chos kyi mig skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan

thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / ban de ye shes sde dang / yi ge pa dgon gling rma la sogs pas zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dru ma ki nan ra rA dza pa ri prIts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ri bya rgod kyi phung po la dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs rab tu thob pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa

dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa la zhugs pa/ bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba/ sems

can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / des pa dang / bzod pa dang / sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems

dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / des pa'i stobs kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med par brtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/ bsam

gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes la mkhas pa/ ri rab kyi ri ltar

sems g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba byams pa chen po la gnas te 'od zer thogs pa med pa/ snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can thams cad kyi bya ba gcig la brtson pa/ dga'

ba chen po la gnas te chos la dga' zhing mgu ba dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms chen po la gnas par brtson pa/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang /

bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las rab tu 'das pa/ pha rol rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kun du rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ u dum bA ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka'

ba/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rab tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ mi 'khrugs par phyad par lung ston pa/ ji ltar smras pa/ de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sems pa/

chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod par yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'da' ba la mkhas pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa mthong ba dang / thos

pa don yod pas rnam par gnon pa/ rtag par rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i mchog thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/

sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la lta ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa dang btags pa la bde blag tu mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs

pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa la/ smon pa med pa sems can dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i

tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos dang / don dang nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po mngon sum du gyur pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/

sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs shin tu bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod snang ba la

'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa/ chos

dkon mchog gi sgron ma 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta bar mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bya bas so sor nye bar gnas pa rnam

pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su brjod kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dga' 'byung dang /

lag na rin po che dang / rin chen me tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang / mthong dga' dang / mig gis mthong dga' dang / mdzes pa'i blo gros dang / dga' zhing mchog tu dga' byed dang / sa 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang /

dpal chen dang / bdud thul dang / me tog man dA ra ba'i dri dang / rlung lha dang / bden dga' dang / mnyam lta dang / ri rab rtse 'dzin dang / ri rab brtsegs dang / ri rab mchog dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshim byed

dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / thogs med sems dang / skya ring blo gros dang / mi skyob pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / byang chub blo gros dang /

'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs me tog dang / lha'i rgyal po dang / lha'i tshul gyis lta ba dang / dpung bzang dang / legs par bsam pa sems pa dang / 'khor lo rab gnas rkang pa dang / mi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i rkang pas rnam par

gnon dang / rkang pas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / dga' spobs dang / spobs myur dang / spobs pa mi 'chad pa dang / spobs pa byin gyis brlabs dang / 'jam sgra dang / sems can thams cad tshim byed dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / bzang skyong

dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong

dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan

gsum bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad/ /khyod ni

'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan/ /snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba/ /'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu mchog mnga' ba/ /dul ba 'dul ba gdul ba'i pha rol phyin/ /bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa/ /gdul

ba'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa/ /'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta/ /dge ba'i mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin pas gzhan gyi

tshogs 'joms shing / /pha rol rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba/ /sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas/ /thugs rje mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bsal ba/ /'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims

gnas/ /lha yi lha mchog dri med dri ma bral/ /pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa/ /dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dgyes/ /rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba/ /nam mkha' mnyam thugs

khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung / /mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rgyu ba/ /'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang mis mchod pa yi mthu bo che/ /mgon

po lha yi dbang po bdun 'joms pa/ /mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mnod pa yi/ /mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag tu bde sdug dam pa'i chos la dgyes/ /mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs/ /chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur/ /

yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung / /thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs/ /bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa mtshan ma med

cing smon dang bral/ /zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/ /thar la 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan/ /thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mnga' ba/ /las kyi rnam

smin 'bras bu kho na gsung / /lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags/ /rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba/ /smig rgyu rgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba/ /dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye ba mi

skye gang du'ang skye ma lags/ /skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa/ /chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas/ /gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung / /rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs/ /ri rab rgyal mtshan

rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku/ /mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa/ /grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum grags pa/ /skyes bu mchog la zhu ba zhus pa rnams/ /'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyer

gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis zhus pa lung

bstan pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skabs dbye bar gnang na bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems

rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams

cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam

zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang dbye ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis

brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa

rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na

byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod par yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa

la yang mi gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun du gda' ba rnams lags/

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam pa ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs

rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang

'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba

rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis par slob dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad

kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams lags/ de skad

ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten

la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs

kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dngangs khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po lha'i cod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams rin po che dang sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dang

ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang / chos mnyan pa'am/ chos bgro ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshan mo 'dug par bskul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i

bsam pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi

za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed thams cad gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs

par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems

dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam

par rtse ba shes pa dang / sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs

kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems can gzud pa shes pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang / bdag

gis sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang

ldan na sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi 'dzud pa dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang / thabs kyis zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / blo shin

tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing / spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rgyu dang / bya ba dang

las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug par shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos

nyid du byed cing chos la chos su smra'i 'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi smra ba ste/ de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu ma rung bar mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa

la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin/ dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras

pa rnams yin/ gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ lag na rin po che thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi

dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag

po tshangs par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na tshul

khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ ka la ping ka'i sgra dang /

rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skye bo mang pos mthong na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par

bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i chog shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol gyis mnan

pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/ bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/ thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi

skyo ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /

bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa rnams yin/ mu cor smra ba med pa rnams yin/ cang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin

no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs

pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi rgyan

gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang /

sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos thams cad la dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs

kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi

sdud pa'i shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrubs pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gis sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos shes pa dang / sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems

dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang /

chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bu rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub

sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la bsams bzhin

du yang skye ba dang / lta ba'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings pa yang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang

ldan na rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod pa yang rnam par mi rtog

pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon par shes pa

lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang

ston la mtshungs par spyod par yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas

kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yi dam mi 'dor ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi

bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang / chos rang bzhin med pas sems

can rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na khams sna

tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun du snang ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par song ba rnams yin/

sbyor ba 'khor bar song ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba la bsam pa song ba rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan

na don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun du snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i

phyir bsod nams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang / slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing / nor med par

yang 'gyur ba dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yin la/ thabs kyis nor med pa rnams

yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang / 'du byed thams cad gzod ma nas sdug

bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ a

zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/

chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi

chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par

rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang / bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnas su shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la

rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang / 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten

gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 'jig rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas kyang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi

bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang

phyug rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag gis bltar

mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba yang dag par

'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang

chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags

pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pa la mkhas

par gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na chos rnams blangs

pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pa sgyu med pa rnams yin/ bdag gis bde ba la mi

chags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de yang / sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don gtong zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong

zhing / sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i zang zing gis 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems

can thams cad kyi rton par gyur pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa rgyun

mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi phyed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor

ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa las mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams yin/ bsams bzhin du tshe dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang ston la phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhing sa bcur

nges par byung na/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man dA

ra ba'i char rab tu phab nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bstan pa 'di ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med

pa nas bsgrubs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mnyan nas mos pa dang / mos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston pa dang /

byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma

yin gyi 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher

rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /

gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems

can thams cad la zhe sdang ba'i sems med de/ shin tu byams pa bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod de chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur

ba dang / thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi

rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ smon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta

bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag sa phyogs mthon dman can dang / ri nag po dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/ /sa chen po 'di thams cad kyang lag mthil

ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to/ /chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod pa med par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna

tshogs skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par btud nas

phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /sa chen po las pad ma tshad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sna tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba skyes so/ /snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur to/ /

mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grags par gyur to/ /ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dri langs par

gyur te/ dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po bsnam par gyur to/ /ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang de las me tog gi char chen po bab ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

gang na ba der mngon par babs nas sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus mo man cad nub par gyur to/ /me tog gi shing de dag las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung ngo / /steng gi bar

snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam kun du gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi do shal dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i sgra yid

du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ chags par byed pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

dga' bar bgyid pa/ mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i

bu 'di ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas 'khor mi'am ci stong phrag du ma dang 'khor dri za stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang bcas te 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so/ /de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong

po sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chu bo'i char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi bang gi khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling

gi gser gyi sab le'u can/ sa le sbram dang / nor bu dang / rin po che du mas spras pa/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs te/ sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu grag par byed do/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi
