ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ rin thang med pa'i ras bcos ma phrugs gcig bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la yang rin thang med pa'i gos kyis so sor bkab bo/ /gnas

thams cad ni yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu brgyad stong pos rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs brgyad stong du tshang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ gtor ma thag tu

sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong tsam na/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu brgyad stong pos bcom ldan

'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba

chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /gang mi'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad ma brdungs ma dkrol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'khrol lo/ /ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang na dri'i shing dang me

tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong byung ngo / /'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad ma tshad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag byung ngo / /pad ma'i

snying po thams cad la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun tu brgyan pa'i lus dag gnas par kun tu snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni yongs su 'dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byung / byang chub sems dpa'

de dag thams cad ni sgra dbyangs dang skad gcig gis tshigs su bcad nas nges par lan 'debs so/ /de la sil snyan las tshigs su bcad pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /ji lta bur ni skyed pa dang / /byang chub snying por 'dug bar du/ /sems ni brjed pa med par 'gyur/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can kun gyi ched kyi phyir/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs/ /snying rje che dang ldan pa ni/ /byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bsam pa ji lta bu/ /rab tu 'byor pa

ci 'dra zhig /de dag snying rje chen po la/ /nges par sems pa ji ltar skye/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ /de dag sbyor ba bcos ma min/ /mya ngan 'da' sgor 'jog pa ni/ /de dag snying rje po sdong de 'dra'o/ /sil snyan

rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gtong ba ji lta bu/ /ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing / /rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar/ /byang chub tu ni sngo bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dngos po kun la mi lta ba/ /des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med/ /byang

chub lam du 'jog byed pa/ /de phyir rnam smin re ba med/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang / /tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med/ /theg chen bla na med pa la/ /ngang tshul ngan can smin par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs

rnams kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems kyi tshul khrims ldan/ /stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems med/ /byams pa chen po skyed pa ni/ /ngang tshul ngan can yongs smin byed/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar na ni sems can gyi/ /spyos shing bsdigs pa bzod byed cing / /

sems kyis gnod pa mi byed la/ /mchog tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs gso ba'i sman pa snyam/ /de dag ngan par smras pa yi/ /tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur ro/ /sil

snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu/ /pha rol gnon pa'ang ci 'dra zhig /ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyis/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ chos dang sems can bsrung ba ni/ /

pha rol gnon dang brtson 'grus so/ /dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni/ /des na sems ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan/ /blo gros rtogs par khong du chud/ /ji ltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /de la chags pa med par 'gyur/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yeng ba med pa dran dang ldan/ /tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan/ /thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /des na de la chags mi 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar shes rab ldan pa dang / /yang

dag lta ba drang po dang / /chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la/ /mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ thos pas shes rab kun tu 'phel/ /rten pas lta ba drang por 'gyur/ /chos kyi sbyin pas nges 'gyur te/ /tshul

bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar thos pa btsal bas na/ /de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur/ /gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar/ /thos pa'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/

gus par byas te thos tshol zhing / /sgrub pa'i thos pa mang du 'gyur/ /zang zing med par chos sbyin pa/ /des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag byams pa ji lta bu/ /de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig /de dag dga' ba ji lta bu/ /btang snyoms

kyang ni ci 'dra zhig /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems dang btang snyoms byams pa ste/ /sems can 'grol ba'i snying rje'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dga' dga' ba ste/ /gnyis spangs pa ni btang snyoms so/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/

ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems kyang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/ /chos thos nas ni ji lta bur/ /de dag the tshom skye mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa/ /des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /

the tshom med cing bsam dag pas/ /chos thos nas ni som nyi med/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod nams tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig /de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la/ /brtson pa yang ni ji lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa'i

gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs/ /'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs/ /zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te/ /chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo / /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni spyod yul gang / /de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu/ /

de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig /de dag sbyor ba'ang ji lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid/ /gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam/ /gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/ /sems can rab grol sbyor ba'o/ /sil

snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bdud kyi las gang yin/ /sangs rgyas phrin las ji lta bu/ /ci 'dra ba yi las byas na/ /byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ theg pa chung ngu bdud kyi las/ /sangs rgyas phrin

las theg pa che/ /sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni/ /byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag grogs bsten ji lta bu/ /sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig /log par lta la mi gnas shing / /ji ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur/ /byang

chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa/ /rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o/ /byang chub sems las gang zlog pa/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ /lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba yi/ /

lta ba drang po ji lta bu/ /sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su/ /ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni/ /de dag drang por lta ba yin/ /log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas/ /lta ba de dag

'jig mi byed/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing / /sems can yongs su smin par byed/ /ji lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/ /de dag byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus kyis

ni chos bsrung ste/ /bsdu bas yongs su smin par byed/ /mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pas ni/ /byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag shes pa'i lam ci 'dra/ /nga rgyal las ni ji lta bu/ /ji ltar bka' blo bde ba dang / /thams cad dus

su 'thun par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ rtsod pa med pa shes pa'i las/ /nga rgyal las ni rtsod pa 'byung / /nges par bka' blo bde ba ste/ /gus pa yis ni 'thun par 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag lam ni ji lta

bu/ /log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig /bla med byang chub lam du ni/ /ji ltar sems can rab tu 'god/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ lam ni pha rol phyin pa drug /theg pa chung ngu log pa'i lam/ /shes rab thabs la bslabs pa ni/ /sems

can lam la 'dzud pa'o/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji lta bur na nor chen 'gyur/ /de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig /gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu/ /gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ nor bdun dang ni rtag tu ldan/ /

chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o/ /de dag gter ni gzungs yin te/ rab tu rnyed nas tshim par byed/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni pha ma gang / /nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig /gang gis mkhas pa de dag mdzes/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ ma ni shes rab pha ni thabs/ /nye du byang chub phyogs rnams yin/ /dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te/ /des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas ni/ /byams pas

'gro ba khyab par byed/ /bdag med pa dang byams pa dag /de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang dag stong nyid rab shes pa/ /de ni bdag med khong du chud/ /gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa/ /de ni de yi byams

pa mchog /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro med na/ /las dang las kyi rnam par smin/ /ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dam pa'i don du 'ong med de/ /gang

du'ang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /kun rdzob tu na lam 'jug cing / /rnam par smin pa nye bar ston/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon lam rnam par spangs par ni/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas/ /de kho na ni ji ltar shes/ /byang

chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med/ /mtshan ma don du gnyer med pa/ /mtshan nyid gcig cing don gcig ste/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan to/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/ /

stong par rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sems can lta ba ji lta bu/ /yongs su smin byed ji lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes rab kyis ni stong par rtogs/ /thabs kyis sems can rnams la lta/ /snying rjes yongs su smin par byed/ /des

ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis/ /skye ba med cing 'byung med par/ /tshul mchog 'di 'dra shes nas ni/ /gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mi skye ba

dang mi 'byung ba/ /de ni shes rab spyod yul lo/ /bsams bzhin du ni gang skye ba/ /de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gtong la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji lta bur ni phyir mi ldog /ji ltar bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /

ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mnyam par gnas par gtong la dga'/ /chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog /mi skye ba la bzod pa ste/ /chos shes nas ni rnam par nges/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ byang

chub snying po snying po gang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang / /ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ byang chub snying po nam mkha' ste/ /byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid

do/ /gang yang kun nas gti mug med/ /de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /de dag gis bzod pa rab tu thob nas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan bcom

ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'di lta bu thob pas sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gi ched du byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang glu dbyangs 'di dag las the tsom 'dri ba'i sgra

'di lta bu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa de dag thams cad kyi lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag cag kyang chos kyi snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das sil snyan de dag

las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs su blta'o/ /bzhin

dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i

bu de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ //bam po bzhi pa/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig kha

dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo/ /mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu

sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ ngos shin

tu rnam par phye ba sha stag go/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag ni rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsa ba yang rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i ras bcos ma'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /khri de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa

gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo / /de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas bla

na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste dad pa thob nas/ thams cad kyis sgra skad dang dbyangs gcig tu tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

mngon par bstod do/ /bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba/ /don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab/ /don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslabs pa/ /sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba 'jig /

dgon par bzhugs dgyes bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po/ /bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan sngar dri bral nyon mongs mi mnga' ba/ /sa yi dbang po pha rol dgra 'joms pa/ /pad mo lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa/ /bde

gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nang na mig dang 'drar spyod cing / /nyi zla 'di yi 'od ni spa bkong ba/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes/ /'khor lo mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing / /

mgon dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur/ /khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig /mtha' yas dbyangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /brnyes dang ma brnyes nam yang chags mi mnga'/ /'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs/ /chags sred

'khri shing dra ba grol mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs shing / /'gro la zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsol pa/ /sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal lo/ /smra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pa/ /lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs/ /'jam zhing snum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung pa/ /srid pa gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba/ /rdzu

'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs/ /'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la ston mdzad pa/ /chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug /ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos

rnams kyang 'grel/ /'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston gyi zla 'dra'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs

bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /skye dgu 'di dag bsgral dka' chu bzhi sgrol/ /bsgoms shing dbang po thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal/ /thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab stsal/ /bslangs na dbang po

dgyes par rab 'gyur ba/ /pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog stsol ba/ /gtong dpa' bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'gal bgyid rnams/ /'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam mchog la/ /rnam par

'dren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod/ /phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas/ /las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs/ /'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod/ /bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa'i chos la dgyes shing mnyam

par bzhag /chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/ /bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog /bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'chos pa mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs po che/ /mi mchog lam dang lam

ma lags la mkhas/ /rlung dmar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'/ /gzir bar gyur gsal pha rol shin tu gnas/ /thub pa bas ma 'tshal ba'i bang mdzod mnga'/ /spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang gA yi/ /bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod/ /mthu brnyes mi g.yo

bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /chags pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs/ /gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis bsten/ /de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs/ /tshe rabs bye ba bsam mi khyab pa dgongs/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'dral/ /'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud/ /phyag dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing / /bkra shis bgyid las 'jam pa'i ran slong ba/ /bcom ldan

bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzungs rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin/ /zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol/ /thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs pa/ /chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya'i rigs dus rgyal po'i las byung ba/ /dbang

po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi/ /ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa/ /bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno ba yi/ /ral gri thogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang / /khyod kyi ba spu tsam yang ma g.yos te/ /

bcom ldan ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /sku rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis kyang bzod/ /yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chi bas dpa'/ /bzod gsung bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi

g.yo ba/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod/ /chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dus bgyis nyam chung snying po med par mkhyen/ /skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel/ /khyod kyi

mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags/ /ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa/ /de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum tshim bgyis/ /khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms/ /khyod kyis bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom/ /srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa/ /thub pa dbang po bsgoms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos bstan pa/ /mtshungs med byang

chub la ni chags mi mnga'/ /grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsungs pa/ /bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud/ /'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab tu bskor/ /'dus bgyis yang dag tu ni rmi lam 'drar/ /

mkhyen nas sems can mang po dran par mdzad/ /khyod kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'/ /ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs/ /ljags ni pad ma 'dab ma brgya lta bu/ /ljags skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid gsum kun la chags

pa mi mnga' ba/ /'gro ba rnams la 'dod pa'i skyon mi gsung / /'dod pa'i chags bral smad pa ma lags pa/ /byang chub mchog la srog chags mos par mdzad/ /nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa/ /ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'/ /mi

yi dam pa gser ltar dpal stug pa/ /khyod kyi mtshan dang grags pa chub par grags/ /gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas/ /'di na bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mig tu gyur/ /gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi don bslabs pas/ /khyod kyis chu bo bzhi la zam

pa btags/ /glang po rin thang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad/ /'dren pa mi dang lha rnams sgrol ba po/ /khyod kyi yon tan mtha' ma mi rnyed de/ /mgon po khyod la bdag ni thal mo sbyar/ /mi yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas/ /mi mjed 'dzam bu'i rgyal por gyur lags

na/ /'dir ni dbang po dang bas thal sbyar nas/ /skyabs su nye bar mchi ba smos ci 'tshal/ /phung po gsog ste nyam chung snying po med/ /stong pa sgyu ma chu zla 'dra bar ni/ /gau tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen/ /phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred

pa'i srad bus dam du mdud bor te/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar dra bar rab grags pa/ /srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dral/ /tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung brjod pa/ /sho be ma lags mi 'gyur 'drid ma lags/ /

phun tshogs gsung de de dag thos nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar te skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir reg pa na/ /nags tshal bcas par rnam pa drug g.yos kyang / /'dir ni gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis/ /bdud phyogs dgra

bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha yi rgyal po che dang mkhas pa gang / /khyod kyi chos don gnyer zhing mchis pa rnams/ /de dag so sor chos bstan thos nas su/ /zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu gtugs par bgyid/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom

ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos

de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sring mo dag de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig

dang / ji ltar bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan

'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sring mo dag chos gcig dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing myur du bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos gcig po de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam

pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjed pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes

pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos 'di gnyis dang

ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa

gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /

sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / g.yo med par bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med par tshul khrims sten

pa dang / g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos

po thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / bsam pa thag pa nas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang / rtag par rgyun du skyes pa'i lus 'thob par

sems skyed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes

pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / bstsal ba med pa dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te

skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa dang / rang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su dor ba'i phyir gtong ba

rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa dang / de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par

'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zas la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skom la sred pa ma yin pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang phreng

ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar sred pa ma yin pa dang / rgod pa dang 'jo ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna

ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg la dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/ sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang

chos dgu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang / bdag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du smra ba ma yin pa dang / srog

tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin te/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos

po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi

skyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang / srog gi phyir yang rdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang / pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog med pa dang / gnod sems

kyi bag la nyal mngon par sgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang

bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/ de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi

tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so sor rtog cing bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed/ skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la chu

shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas 'du byed thams cad la mi gnas shing de la chags pa mi skyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtogs

nas chos thams cad la chags pa med zhe sdang med gti mug med pa dang / lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang / chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus

la so sor rtog go/ /lus 'di ni bsdus pa rtswa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las

kyi byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang bud med mig la kha zas las skyes pa sha'i gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang

bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / ngag la brag ca lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o/ /sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi

dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das las bud med kyi dngos po las sgyur ba'i chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /dri med

dri bral dri ma gcod mdzad pa/ /rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mnga'/ /pad ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs/ /dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mdzad zhi mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa/ /dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon par

dgyes/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga' ba/ /yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms/ /pad ma lta bur stong mchog bka' mchid gsung / /lam mchog stsol cing dam pa'i don ston pa/ /

mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung / /sa la rgyu ba 'di la mig stsol ba/ /'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba/ /rdul med phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs rdul bsal dam pa mthu

bo che/ /mgon po 'gro la mchog gi don mdzad pa/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred pa'i 'khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa med/ /brnyes pa dag dang ma brnyes mtshungs mnyam thugs/ /

'jig rten mthar 'byin snang ba'i sgron mdzad pa/ /rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'/ /sbyin pa stsol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyes/ /dul ba zhi gnas yon tan pha rol phyin/ /nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa stsol/ /skye bo'i 'dren pa lha yi mchog pas mchog /byams dang stobs dang bzod la nges par dgyes/ /mchod 'os bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mar me lta bu dri med zla ba 'dra/ /phyi nang nyon mongs

dri ma gcod mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter/ /zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong zhi mdzad pa/ /ston pa skye mched drug las thar mdzad pa/ /rjes su dran drug shin tu yongs dag dran/ /rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog blta/ /gsung snyan dam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs/ /bcom ldan gang zag dam pa skyes bu mchog /srid gsum zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs/ /rtag tu

dka' thub brtul zhugs rab tu spyod/ /de bzhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin gsung / /mun par sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal/ /de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa/ /yon tan brjod pa mthong zhing grags bsgrags

pas/ /mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsngags la gnas shing brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags/ /khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa/ /ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog /skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ka la

bing ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can/ /'dod pa rtsod bgyid dri ma sel mdzad pa/ /phung po yongs mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs/ /yon tan tshogs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan ston pa yon tan bstod mchod pa/ /zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/ /'dzum

zhal zla 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa/ /bdud stobs 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam thugs kha lo sgyur ba rab dul thugs/ /kun gyis mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas/ /thub pa mchog gsung bden pa'i bka' mchid can/ /bde gshegs mnyam

thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam stsol snyan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /bdud kyi sde mang 'joms mdzad nga rgyal dang / /lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi mnga' tshul mi 'chos/ /thub pa dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes/ /

rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang rab rib bral/ /bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la zhugs/ /stobs bcu mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba mi mnga' ba/ /rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal/ /nam

mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe bcom ldan

'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po

dang / le brgan dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'o/ /de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mog mog por byas te/ slar log nas bcom

ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par

bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /zla ba dri ma med zhal khyod la zhu/ /dri med gzi brjid

mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu/ /bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /dam pa'i gzugs rnams mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ /'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu/ /lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod khyod la zhu/ /bde bar

gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /sbyin dang dul la dgyes pa khyod la zhu/ /tshul khrims yongs dag gyur pa khyod la zhu/ /bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs stsol khyod la zhu/ /bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu/ /

bsam gtan mngon shes dgyes pa khyod la zhu/ /shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu/ /bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyod la zhu/ /rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu/ /dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la

zhu/ /bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu/ /spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la zhu/ /bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu/ /bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod

la zhu/ /ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu/ /bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyod la zhu/ /bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/ /stobs bcu dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ /the tsom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la zhu/ /yon tan stong gis brgyan pa khyod

la zhu/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas rnams nga las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur zhing skyes pa'i dngos po thob par bya ba'i phyir nga'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'

bo mi 'am ci'i slas brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bsam pa thag pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'dis 'di ni shi 'phos nas bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der skyes nas kyang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na mnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun bgro ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /

bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang rim gyis mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gis dam pa'i chos kyang kun bgro ba byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun

tu rdzogs par byas nas/ gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston

par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do/ /ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam bkum mo/ /bde 'gro thams cad kyi

lam rnam par sbyangs so/ /bdag cag byang chub kyi lam la rab tu bkod do/ /bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstan to/ /bdag cag ye shes kyis la bkod do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar bgyis so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to/ /thabs la mkhas pa

bstan to/ /bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin pa stsal to/ /chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /dga' ba dang dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob pas gzengs bstod do/ /chos zab mo'i bzod pa la rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /bdag

cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bkod do/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa gzo ba lags kyi byas pa mi gzo ba ma lags kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mi lon na gzhan gyis lan ldon par

mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i ming ni

ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa ni ji 'dra zhig tu 'gyur/ de'i sems can bkod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni ji 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis yongs su mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas te/ sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dun par byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan

'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chad ma mdzad pa'i 'dzum pa mthong nas stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs kyi 'dzum pa ci 'dra ba/ /de ring phyung ste thug

med bye ba'i zhing / /rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i rdul mtha' yas/ /khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yong ma mthong / /tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/ /mi dbang gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur/ /'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu ni lung bstan

gsol/ /su yi ched du dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od phyung bas/ /'dir ni ngan song gsum zhi byang chub yan lag rdzogs/ /chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnams kyi dogs pa sol/ /mi rnams kyi ni yid gnyis ma lus legs par khum/ /'khor kun dga' bas rtog bgyid na/ /su

slad de ring 'dzum pa bstan/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor ba byas te rang gi stan la 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzigs

nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang / rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang / rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med ces bya bar yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs

su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med pa de ni lag

mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ bai DUr+ya dkar po las grub pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ mching bu med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par

gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na longs spyod de/ de dag nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs

pa na gnas pa na bai DUr+ya dkar po las grub pa'i sa chen po der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'o zhes dran pa skye bar

'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang la the tsom za ba na de de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar gyur pa de la zhu bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la zhus pa'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /

byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos de thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yod par mi 'gyur

ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bud med du gdags pa'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten

gyi khams de na kha zas su gdags pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i zas can du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la

nges par 'gyur ba dag go/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims log par zhugs pa'am/ lta ba log par zhugs pa'am/ cho ga log par zhugs pa'am/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad ni nan tan

dang ldan pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba sha stag go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang / pha rol

rgol ba med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na ming du btags pa tsam dang / 'du shes tsam ma gtogs par lha dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro/ /sems

can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyod pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yang lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo

mang po la bde ba'i phyir bar gyi bskal pa bcu tham par bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba

'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig

rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo bar gyi

bskal pa de yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi bskal pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das las

lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang / /dri ma

med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na/ /de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor 'gyur/ /rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med/ /thams cad med de gzung med gsog dang gsob/ /chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas/ /'dus

byas dag la skyo bar 'gyur ba med/ /la las sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang / /shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba/ /dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar/ /phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba rdos pa bzhin/ /tshor ba 'di ni

chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs/ /'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med/ /srid gsum 'di ni sems yid rnam par shes/ /rgyal bas de bzhin sgyu 'dra gsog tu gsungs/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni/ /

'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med/ /khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang / /skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang / /chos 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin/ /rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang / /

de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang / /rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad/ /stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag /bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang / /de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros par/ /gang gi 'jug pa de

'drar gyur pa de/ /pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin/ /bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam/ /nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag /zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi/ /lam 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu zhi/ /bsdu ba bzhi po khyad par

'phags pa 'di/ /rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs/ /'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa/ /de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin/ /sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med/ /srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do/ /dbang po drug

'di stong ste rab zhi bar/ /gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med/ /de ni gang du'ang bdag med rlom sems med/ /gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa/ /sems can byang chub sems dpa' de

dpal ldan/ /chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra/ /gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gror mi 'gyur/ /chos dbyings 'di yi gnas pa rig nas ni/ /rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas/ /gang na'ang yod pa'am med pa med mod kyi/ /rgyu la brten nas chos

rnams 'byung bas na/ /mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni/ /sems kyi 'khri shing de ltar shes par bya/ /rlung ni nam mkhar mi chags rgyu ba bzhin/ /gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas/ /

nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ni rtsig pa rtswa dang lo ma 'dra/ /blun pa rje med rdo shing ngan pa ltar/ /de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas/ /lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do/ /tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra/ /ri dang

phug gi brag ca lta bu ste/ /de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa/ /sgra rnams kun la 'dod pa'i chags pa med/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos gnas mi ltung ste/ /mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin/ /chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms

nas ni/ /de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas/ /bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni/ /ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig /chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar 'drar shes pa/ /de sreg bskal tshe zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro/ /ri dang

ri bar kho ra khor yug ri/ /de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun/ /nam mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang / /khams bzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par/ /dpa' bo tshul

'di khong du chud pa dag /mkha' las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro/ /srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag /bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa/ /de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang / /sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med/ /rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog

ma yin yang / /sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye/ /sems dang yid ni mtshungs pa dben par gyur/ /rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam/ /sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad spyod cing / /dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni/ /byang chub

mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa/ /grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun ni rang yul yang dag ste/ /mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam/ /mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa/ /yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur/ /

bdag ni gzugs min tshor min 'du shes min/ /sems pa ma yin rnam par shes med kyang / /byang chub khong du chud pas bdag lung bstan/ /phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan/ /bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nas zhi yi/ /skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra

min la/ /mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na/ /mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to/ /chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam/ /bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te/ /stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang

bzhin no/ /zad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus/ /mi zad pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur/ /zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes/ /bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to/ /mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de/ /yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las

grol/ /ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min/ /de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan/ /gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na/ /chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba yin/ /sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin/ /chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di

mtshungs shing mnyam/ /khyed cag thams cad sa yi steng na 'khod/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas/ /sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni/ /srid pa gsum na chags med ye shes 'jug /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos tshigs

su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas steng gi bar snang las babs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi ched du byung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag

sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma bslus pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung

bstan to/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'am

ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/

rgyas pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ /de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to/ /dge ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai DUr+ya las grub pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dga'

ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu

de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i slas ni stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do/ /de'i bu ni stong tham pa yod de/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs can

pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal pos 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu la lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal

cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas

nye bar brtan nas bud med bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu stong po de dag dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /des byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang lo bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad

pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de na rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu thu bo re re rgyal por bcug nas pha'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to/ /rgyal po gzhon

nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chung sa snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te/ de ni chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun par dbang byed du bcug go/ /rigs kyi bu

de ltar rgyal po sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung ngo / /rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i

'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za'am yid gnyis su gyur pa lta na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal

po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni de ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de las bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad/ da'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar gyur to/ /'dis

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'di la ngas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung yang bstan to/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas

'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i rgyu ba nas yun ring du lags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de

bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyu zad pa/ 'gags pa/ bral

ba/ rnam par gyur pa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang / rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa'am/ lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang

bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud byung ba dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems rang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba de

dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/ /gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung

du bstan pa'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas pa/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya

ba'i phyir rang gi khang khyim dang / 'khor gyi khyams de yang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/ des na skye bo mang po la phan pa

dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya

bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs su lags kyang bdag cag ni sil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs

sgra dang / glu dang gar la rab tu chags/ me tog dang spos dang bdug pa dang byug pa dang / phye ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i

chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la stsal bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzhin dag de'i phyir deng phyin

cad sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar khyed la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang /

zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings

kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med pa'i sgra dang / gang zag med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams

pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / 'ong ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i

sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten pa med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang / dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang / lam gyi sgra dang / zhi gnas kyi sgra dang / lhag mthong gi sgra dang / thabs kyi sgra dang /

bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgra dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / brag ca lta

bu'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang / dbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing gi phung po dang / sgyu ma dang /

snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos bsgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhin dag de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las gang gi khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub par 'gyur

ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// //bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub 'di byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /

grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do/ /de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag go cha gang gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du

gzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no/ /grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di lta rang da ltar bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba

yin par rig par bya'o/ /grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis rim gror byas pa ni sems can thams cad la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag byang

chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs pa ni sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can

thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /de nas mi

'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di snyam du bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag gis de bzhin gshegs

pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/ de ltar na

bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos yid las byung ba lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'phang du dpag tshad lnga khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa/ kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba shing ljon pa sna

tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ rin po che'i skud pa mig ris su bres pa mngon par sprul nas shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ 'phang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos ma zung brgya stong mang

po bkram pa mngon par sprul/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan zhing zhabs 'bring du 'brang ba brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong

ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar

te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan bshams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs su gsol/ de nas seng ge'i khri de la

bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ shing ta la bdun

srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas/ de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad dang bu brgyad stong po de dag dang gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang dri za dang lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing

rta la btags te nam mkha' las drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed de mdun

du dong zhing bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po/ /gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag /sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing / /yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid/ /

mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur/ /gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs/ /bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa/ /yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra/ /g.yas g.yon

na yang rnam par mthong ma myong / /ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g.yo ba/ /de ltar khyed kyi sku ni dpal gyis mdzes/ /'dren pa khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi/ /nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan

nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha/ /nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od/ /khyed kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur/ /shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan/ /sems

can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas/ /'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba po/ /bden pa bzhi la bsgom zhing dpyod mdzad pa/ /rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi

stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes/ /bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' zhing / /rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par bzhag /legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang / /khyod ni tshig

dang skad la gnas ma lags/ /khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan/ /zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi/ /sgra ni sems can gang gis thos gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur/ /sems can kha lo sgyur ba spu gcig tu/ /stong gsum

rgya mtsho'i chab rnams zhugs gyur kyang / /sems can rags pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la/ /rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yong mi gda'/ /stong gsum gyi ni ri bo ri rab dag /phyag gcig gi ni mthil du bzhag nas su/ /zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad

kyang / /khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis/ /khyod ni bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas nas/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang / /sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs/ /sangs

rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad/ /de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung / /thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'/ /rim gror ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / /rim gro bgyis

pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags/ /dog sa lta bur snyoms shing mi g.yo ste/ /'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad ma bzhin/ /chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang / /chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang / /dbu ba rdos 'dra rmi lam glog 'dra dang / /smig rgyu'i

mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis/ /gdod nas stong zhing mi g.yo rjes ma mchis/ /nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis/ /dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra/ /las dang bya brgyu dang rkyen rnams las/ /byung

ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par/ /tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na/ /de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi/ /gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa/ /de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis/ /de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te/ /

srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags/ /bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod/ /kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su/ /byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te/ /gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog /nam mkha' la

ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'/ /rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'/ /nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gda' yi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi gda'/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs

pas gshegs shing / gser gyi kha dog lta bur sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang rab tu khyab par

gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal pa dang / khyim

bdag tu bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba

dan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /sdong po'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed

do/ /mi 'am ci mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grag par gyur to/ /de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te bya rgod kyi

phung po'i ri la bzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang shing rta de las babs nas bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs

te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen

dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod

pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyel tam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i 'khor dang

bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po slas dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying

po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/

tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i bdag po sdong po la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho bos kyang thob par 'dod do/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa/ rgyal po

chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang sems can thams cad la dbul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de gang yang med do/ /rgyal po chen

po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi bgyid/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i

dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang /
