sems can gyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/ de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i chos thos nas des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ling tog

chen pos mtshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byang ba'i sems bsal nas khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing gnas pas khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te/ ji nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa'ang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ba dag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i

cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i snod

sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i snod sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo

gros dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad

bskyabs pa'i snod snying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos

pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang / mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /

chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba'i snod zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrugs

shing phyad par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis

po 'di dag dang ldan na chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du

gyur cig /bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyis 'khor 'di skyo bar

'gyur du 'ong gis khyod rang gi gnas su song shig /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan

'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags/ ji ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta

ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med par thos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i

bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa de yang bdag gi

yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med

pa bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa la re ba dang / skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas theg pa la re ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing

yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu mi 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la mi dbang ba dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos

bsrung ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ slong ba mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang / bsod snyoms byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams

gzhan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta

ste/ slong ba la bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed cing zhe sdang ba'i sems med la bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med de tshur shog legs par 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang

du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo

bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang /

sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing gong du mi tshol ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i

bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang / sems

can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongs su bkang ba'i phyir de la mi chags pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi bsgrub pa 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la lan btab nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi bsgrub pa la 'jug

pa 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ji ltar sems can

yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rang gi pi bang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so/ /pi bang de

blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis pi bang gi sgra de las seng ge bsgyings pa ltar shing sA la du ma g.yo ba'i sgrar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /phan pa

spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang / /chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod/ /bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang / /sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod

pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med/ /brtan pa spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang / /bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa yin/ /dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa dang / /dngos

po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin/ /tshul khrims spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang / /lus dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag

ngan pa'i ngang tshul spyod pa med/ /brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang / /khro skyon yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yin/ /brtson 'grus spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang / /

'khor bar yongs su mi skyo spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin/ /bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang / /lus dang sems ni rab tu dben spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag

g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin/ /shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang / /chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag shes rab 'chal pa'i spyod pa med/ /byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang / /sems

can kun la snying rje spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag khro ba'i tha ba med par spyod/ /stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang / /mtshan ma med pa yongs su dag spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag smon pa med par spyod pa

yin/ /yang dag spyod dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su dag spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gang du'ang chags pa med par spyod/ /dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang / /dran dang g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang / /byang

chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag yongs su gcod pa med par spyod/ /bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang / /mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag chags pa med

par spyod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang / /dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin/ /chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang / /sems can

thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin/ /bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang / /mtha' kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /

de dag gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa med/ /dag par spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang / /nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med/ /bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam thar

spyod/ /sems can kun la 'jigs med mchog spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag smon lam spyod pa med pa yin/ /nyi ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang / /pad ma lta bur gos pa med spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod

pa/ /de dag lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba/ /brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang / /dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed/ /mchog spyod pa

dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang / /'dod chags nyes pa tha ba gcod spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med/ /lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang / /shes rab mig ni yongs su dag spyod

dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag yongs su rtog par spyod pa med/ /dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi spyod dang / /ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag lha dang mi ni mang pos bstod/ /

'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang / /g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa yin/ /dpa' bo spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod pa/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'jigs par byed spyod dang / /

byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag byang chub snying por gzhol ba yin/ /gzung ba spyod dang don yod spyod pa dang / /gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med/ /dgon pa

spyod dang rab tu dben spyod pa/ /rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin/ /gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang / /'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang / /

byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag chung ngu la ni spyod pa med/ /rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang / /bsam gtan bde las ldog par spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag mi shes spyod pa med pa yin/ /lta ba

spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang / /ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag 'jigs pa med par spyod pa yin/ /thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang / /dbang po yongs su smin par spyod pa dang / /byang chub

mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag ye shes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di pi bang gi sgra de las byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu

thob par gyur to/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o/ /nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par

'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'gror gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bu dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ slas dang bcas/ rang gi skye bo dang

bcas 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bzod pa gsol nas sil snyan dkrol/ me tog gi char phab/ 'od zer gyi dra ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu

g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyis/ kau shi ka byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa thob pa ma gtogs par gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos

zil gyis non to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis non to/ /kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems

dpa' ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis mi non to/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil gyis gnon par sems pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs

pa 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga'

zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yang 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa

rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la

sten pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o/ /yab skyon med pa la zhugs te rgyud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste/ theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa la da bgyir ci mchis/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las lha'i bu stong tham pas bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa bcom ldan 'das

sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bstar ba ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me

mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa gang

bdag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyis mi skye

ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /

bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /

lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtse ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtse

ba dang / mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /'od

zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang chub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la

byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang / skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang

bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur

ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres

pa med pas chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par

'gyur ro/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thun par chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang pos

brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgom bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas

'bum 'gyur du skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'chal ba dang ldan pa blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mchis pa/ tha chad la zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes

par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa/ chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen

bgyi ba gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang

zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/

stong gi cha dang / stong phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung

ba'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad

kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /

'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang / de bzhin du bsgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer

ba dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams

ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa

dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang / phye ma red kyi dus dang /

srod dang / nam gyi gung thun dang / tho ras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byin pa

dang / rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo gcig gam/ lo brgya'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na kun dga' bo de la ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das mang ste tshad ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de yang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub don du gnyer ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang / sems can rab tu thar par bya ba don du gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs

'di thos nas mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na gang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang ston na de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sbyin pa thams cad zil

gyis gnon pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog go/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'dzin pa de ni rjes su bzung ba rnams kyi mchog go/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi gding ba de ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go/ /'di lta ste chos yongs su

'dzin pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro/ /zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni lus brtan pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'

nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa de sbyin par bya ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsa

gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtog pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti

mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis brjod par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bsrung

bar 'gyur ba dang / las byas nas bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags

par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos

'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing / de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skye ba

dran par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nam du yang dbang po mi tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid can gyi gzungs kyi sa bon bsgrub par

'gyur ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mkhas pas g.yog byas par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems la tshul

bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas de chos kyi gter zad mi shes pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin na yon tan gyi khyad

par yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs

su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/ kun bsrung bar bgyi/ mos par bgyi/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer

ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ kau shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nga'i

dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur lha rnams ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ chos thams

cad mi dmigs pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo / /kau shi ka gang mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma mchis pa btang ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho

brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom

ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang sba ba dang bskyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gi 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas

dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang ji nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa

la brtson pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa srung ba mchis pa de dag srung ba'i ched du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag la kha ton du bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci

dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /tar+ya thA/ ta ra be/ a ra be/ a no pe/ sa ra pe/ hu lu ma hA

hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ a bad Te/ bi kad Te/ pa ri ts+tshe dA ni/ ni gr-i h+Ni te/ pra g+hA ta ni/ id Ti id Ti/ bid Ti bid Ti/ ad tshe gad tshe/ mA ra ni gra ha na/ sarba pa ra pra bA di ni gra ha na/ sarba mi th+ya pra yA tA nan ni gra ha na/ sarba b+hU ta gra hAn/ bud d+ha bar Ni ta d+harma ni ya ta shA ya b+hu tan/ bud d+ha

bar Ni tAn/ tsa tur ma hA rA dza ni rde shAn/ man+t+ra ba lAn/ a ba tA ra/ prek+Shi NA ni gra hA ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang

dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ji nas yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir khyed gnyis kyi lag tu bzhag go gtad do/ /de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das

pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyas par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang yongs su 'dzin par

bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba de dag ni byang chub

sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs legs par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchi ma zag cing nga ro phyung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa la ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so/ /gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rton pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa des bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag nyid rnyis par gyur pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba bstsal

du gsol/ gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yang mi gsung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can khyod dang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni mang / gang dag mos

pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis/ mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig /sdig can 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i steng nas rdul blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so/ /sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab

mo 'di la ma mos te/ de dag thams cad ni khyod dang 'thun no/ /sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang 'thun gyis de bas na sdig can dga' bar gyis shig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems

dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /dge slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan brgya stong dag ni ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol lo/ /lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang la kye ma

bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di na grong khyer 'khor mor 'jig tu chos kyi

'khor lo bskor te/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa de bas ches mchog go/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris te/ 'chang ba'i sems

can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das las

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos

rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig

rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par dga'o// //'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po dang /
dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing sa te gtan la phab pa// //
